channel.title: Lanscape issue
channel.description:
hello so i have ran into a problem that i hope someone can give me some knowledge on. Problem: When i go to a certain area all the NPC's and objects are in places as well as the walls, but Everything is Black.. the walls and the ground tiles.
Ive looked at my lanscape and it does not show it like this when in a landscape editor.
Any help would be appreciated thanks.

item.title: Lanscape issue
item.dc:creator: @matty_matt matty matt
item.description:
@matty_matt wrote:

ok, i have fixed this error which was server sided.
It had to do with the order in things were done where my go up,go down was handled. Thanks for trying.

Read full topic

item.title: Lanscape issue
item.dc:creator: @CodeForFame CodeForFame
item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

[quote=“matty matt, post:17, topic:474561”]what do people think it would be server sided or client sided… what files could cause this…?[/quote]There are too many to list, and it could be either. If you don’t want to start from scratch, you need to generate a diff and work off of that.

Read full topic

item.title: Lanscape issue
item.dc:creator: @CodeForFame CodeForFame
item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

[quote=“matty matt, post:15, topic:474561”]o i didn’t know if there would be a select few files it could be.
Ive had this for over a year, so it could be anything.

I thought someone could point me in the direction to which file it would be that would cause this.

EDIT: so no one knows how to help me here?[/quote]You could create a diff of the server and client with the originals, then use that to narrow it down… Though, I’m pretty sure you’d be better off starting from scratch.

Read full topic

item.title: Lanscape issue
item.dc:creator: @matty_matt matty matt
item.description:
@matty_matt wrote:

o i didn’t know if there would be a select few files it could be.

item.title: Lanscape issue
item.dc:creator: @CodeForFame CodeForFame
item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

[quote=“matty matt, post:10, topic:474561”][quote author=CodeForFame link=topic=592510.msg4184575#msg4184575 date=1355966370]

What client are you using?

EASYRSC

EDIT: i found out is has nothing to do with the lanscape.rscd. Anyone have any idea?
[/quote]It doesn’t do that by default, so what did you do?

I don’t know or it would be fixed lol
that is why i made this postin the help section because i need help[/quote]So, you have no idea what you modified? Maybe you should start over and keep track of it this time.

Finding a bug like this, when you have absolutely no idea what you changed is going to be near impossible. It could be any number of things in the client or server, or a combination of both.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @imthenull imthenull
item.description:
@imthenull wrote:

-Nothing:

Try to send world info when you teleport there.

That should already happen. unless he modified it.
